entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as still holding onto Hermione's hand for dear life. This indicates that he is a person who is physically present in the scene.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as twisting in midair and dragging Harry into darkness. This indicates that she is a person who is physically present in the scene and has agency in the action.

entities.name: house
entities.description: The house is described as collapsing, indicating that it is a physical structure that is being affected by the events of the scene.

relationships.description: Harry is holding onto Hermione's hand for dear life. This indicates a physical relationship between the two characters.
Harry fell into darkness, indicating that he was affected by the collapse of the house.
Hermione dragged Harry into darkness, indicating a physical relationship between her and the house.
